name: still-waiting
description: Tracking app monitoring for the release of the Omnipod 5 iOS app in 2024.

scripts.cp-files: cp -r src/assets dist/ && cp CNAME dist/CNAME && cp src/favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico && cp src/apple-touch-icon.png dist/apple-touch-icon.png
scripts.build: npm run minify-html-index && npm run minify-html-404 && npm run optimize-css && npm run minify-js && npm run cp-files
scripts.prod-build: mkdir dist && npm run minify-html-index && npm run minify-html-404 && npm run optimize-css && npm run minify-js && npm run cp-files
